body_html:
The tf.nn.dynamic_rnn library uses TensorFlow control-flow, which isn't well supported by XLA. There's a little bit of special support in the JIT codepath, but the AOT (i.e. tfcompile) codepath doesn't support this at all right now.

Errors about Enter, Exit, Switch and Merge nodes are all symptoms of of this problem.

There is no workaround at the moment. There are some in-process discussions and prototyping about how to handle this. Our exact approach hasn't been fleshed out yet.

@hawkinsp may have some more details.
body_text:
The tf.nn.dynamic_rnn library uses TensorFlow control-flow, which isn't well supported by XLA.  There's a little bit of special support in the JIT codepath, but the AOT (i.e. tfcompile) codepath doesn't support this at all right now.
Errors about Enter, Exit, Switch and Merge nodes are all symptoms of of this problem.
There is no workaround at the moment.  There are some in-process discussions and prototyping about how to handle this.  Our exact approach hasn't been fleshed out yet.
@hawkinsp may have some more details.
body:
The `tf.nn.dynamic_rnn` library uses TensorFlow control-flow, which isn't well supported by XLA.  There's a little bit of special support in the JIT codepath, but the AOT (i.e. tfcompile) codepath doesn't support this at all right now.

Errors about `Enter`, `Exit`, `Switch` and `Merge` nodes are all symptoms of of this problem.

There is no workaround at the moment.  There are some in-process discussions and prototyping about how to handle this.  Our exact approach hasn't been fleshed out yet.

@hawkinsp may have some more details.
